item.title: Resume
item.author: ted.summer2@google.com (Ted)
item.description: Education M.S. in Computer Science University of Chicago, 3.9 / 4.0, 2018-2019 Relevant coursework: Algorithms C Programming Operating Systems Networks Parallel Programming Big Data Application Security Intro to Computer Systems Discrete Math B.S. double major in Neuroscience and Chinese Studies Furman University, 3.48 / 4.0, 2012-2016 Work experience Graduate Practicum Student, Developer University of Chicago - Globus Labs January 2019 - Present Created Python package which automates the process of deploying, running, and optimizing arbitrary programs Used Bayesian Optimization to significantly reduce the amount of time required optimize tool configuration Created RESTful web service for running jobs with the package on AWS and storing results using Flask, Redis, Docker Compose and PostgreSQL Software Developer Intern University of Chicago - Center for Translational Data Science
